overview: In this affecting drama, Lawrence Raghavendra stars as irresponsible Ashok, who likes to party hearty with his friends -- using daddy's hard-earned cash -- until he meets a staid woman who transforms his life. To win the heart of beautiful Priya (played by Anu Prabhakar), Ashok changes his ne'er-do-well ways and becomes a hard-working, successful businessman. The only trouble is, Priya loves another man.
title: Arputham
